remarks: The predicate "is a ring isomorphism between ` R ` and ` S ` ." (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
statement:
rngisoval.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
rngisoval.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngisoval.3 $e |- J = ( 1st ` S ) $.
rngisoval.4 $e |- Y = ran J $.
isrngoiso $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( F e. ( R RngIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R RngHom S ) /\ F : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) ) $.
